definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: When I was in Shanghai, she would tell me about the great changes there.
sentences.chinese: 當我在上海時她總是對我講上海的巨大變化。

sentences.english: This is an area where the stiffness of the concrete structures significantly changes.
sentences.chinese: 在這個區域水泥結構的粘着力會發生巨大變化。

sentences.english: Old spent hens escorted out a small gray doves, flowers fort immediately face became pale and long.
sentences.chinese: 等老花母雞扶着小灰鴿一出門，花堡長立刻臉色大變。

sentences.english: Ah, what a difference a homegrown financial crisis makes.
sentences.chinese: 啊，一場國產的金融危機令一切大變樣。

sentences.english: I've been to China years ago and it has changed out of all recognition.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前我去過中國，中國已經大變樣了。

sentences.english: The way I see it is Japan has finally had its post–World War II political upheaval.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，日本終於要面對二戰之後的政治大變局了。

sentences.english: The period of the Northern Warlords' rule over China was an era of a great change.
sentences.chinese: 北洋軍閥統治時期，是個大變局時代。

sentences.english: His poems are considered to be" A great reform to Tang Poetry".
sentences.chinese: 他的詩歌被後人評價爲“唐詩之一大變”。

sentences.english: That alone makes a world of difference.
sentences.chinese: 光這一點本身就會使你的世界大變模樣。

sentences.english: The venerable Hypertext Markup Language is getting a face lift, too.
sentences.chinese: 流行的超文本標記語言也正在進行大變臉。

sentences.english: This 3-week visit opened their eyes to the dramatic changes in China.
sentences.chinese: 三週的參觀使他們看到了中國的巨大變化。

sentences.english: Each spring, after he shaved it, he looked so different from before.
sentences.chinese: 等到春天，他一颳了臉，人就大變樣了。

sentences.english: Both the vocabulary and grammar have changed considerably.
sentences.chinese: 詞彙和語法都發生了巨大變化。

sentences.english: The nine man saw this scene, face big change.
sentences.chinese: 九太爺見到這一幕，臉色大變。

sentences.english: Perhaps the main reason ， however ， centers on dramatic changes in traditional concepts .
sentences.chinese: 然而，主要的原因可能是傳統觀念發生了巨大變化。

sentences.english: We all know about the great changes taking place in Zhongyuan oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 我們都瞭解中原油田正在發生的巨大變化。

definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to see with one's own eyes/very soon
ready to start on sth/about to act
to turn hostile suddenly/face changing, a device of Sichuan Opera, a dramatic change of attitude expressing fright, anger etc
variant of 動蕩|动荡[dong4 dang4]
